subSubSection.paragraph:
Dorsal shield 280 long and 175 wide; j 1 20 , j 3 29 , j 4 10 , j 5 10 , j 6 12 , J 2 10 , J 5 7 , z 2 14 , z 4 24 , z 5 8 , Z 1 16 , Z 4 36 , Z 5 46 , s 4 36 , S 2 18 , S 4 12 , S 5 7 , r 3 16 , R 1 12 ; ventri-anal shield 108 long and 152 wide at the anterior corners; JV 5 23 ; Sge

, Sti

, Sge

, Sti

, St

, 58 ° 3 '' 36.8 ''W),

( 1 Ψ); Goya – Rincón (

( 1 Ψ); on

sp. 1 ( 3 Ψ). Salta : San Ramón de la Nueva Orán – Orán (

,

),
9 -V- 2007
, on

( 1 Ψ); San Ramón de la Nueva Orán – Arroyo Zenta (

,

( 1 Ψ); San Ramón de la Nueva Orán – Ingenio San Martín del Tabacal (

10 -V- 2007
,

( 1 Ψ, 2 immatures); Joaquín V. Gonzalez – Desvío (

,

),

sp. ( 2 Ψ, 1 ɗ, 1 immature).
Previous records. Brazil , Colombia , Costa Rica , El Salvador , Guadeloupe , Guyana , Jamaica , Paraguay and Peru (Guanilo et al . in press ).
